import React from 'react' export default function About() { return (

About

Description: PreBoost is an innovative web-based tool designed to help engineering students prepare for interviews using cutting-edge technologies like AI-generated questions, speech recognition, fluency analysis, and eye-tracking feedback. Key Features: AI-Driven Interview Questions Generates unique, dynamic technical questions based on user input (education, location, resume). Smart Resume Upload Resume-based question generation for personalized practice. Voice Answer Capture with SpeechRecognition API Transcribes answers in real-time as the user speaks, with support for "stop" commands. WPM & Fluency Feedback Measures speaking words-per-minute and provides constructive feedback like "Excellent fluency" or "Needs improvement". Live Eye Tracking (WebGazer.js) Monitors gaze activity during responses to simulate real interview pressure and improve focus awareness. Interactive Vanta.js Background Adds an animated wave background for a modern, immersive feel. Clean UI with Bootstrap + React Responsive layout with a fixed-top Navbar, form section, and dynamically rendered Q&A panel. Tech Stack: Frontend: React.js, Bootstrap 5 AI & Analysis: OpenAI API, NLP backend (Node.js/Express) Speech Recognition: react-speech-recognition Eye Tracking: WebGazer.js Visual FX: Vanta.js (WAVES) Backend API: Node.js + Express (for generating questions, answers, and analysis) Camera Access: WebRTC via navigator.mediaDevices Use Cases: Engineering students preparing for placement or GATE/UPSC technical rounds. Soft skills training including fluency and real-time speaking practice. Institutions simulating virtual interviews for mock sessions.

) }
